name: Framestr for WordPress
author: Framestr, Inc.

sections.description: This plugin helps you in fetching your forms directly from your framestr account. You can add shortcodes to the places where you’d like to have the form placed.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the framestr-for-wp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Framestr for WP.
  4. Set you Secret key and click save changes. Select the forms from the dropdown that you’d like.
  5. Once done, please visit forms section and select the form needed.
  6. You can select forms with embed code or shotcode. Place it into any page and publish the page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the framestr-for-wp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Framestr for WP.
  4. Set you Secret key and click save changes. Select the forms from the dropdown that you’d like.
  5. Once done, please visit forms section and select the form needed.
  6. You can select forms with embed code or shotcode. Place it into any page and publish the page.

short_description: Fetch Framestr forms directly to your wordpress website
description: This plugin helps you in fetching your forms directly from your framestr account. You can add shortcodes to the places where you’d like to have the form placed.
